means: 逮捕( arrest的过去式和过去分词 )

word_mean: 停止的，阻止的：在产科学中，指胎头在盆腔中阻留，但非嵌塞

sentence.Network_en: "He's been arrested for theft and burglary." — "Good grief!"
sentence.Network_cn: “他因为偷窃和入室盗窃而被逮捕了。”——“我的天哪！”

sentence.Network_en: Police investigating a £10 million car insurance fiddle arrested 16 people yesterday.
sentence.Network_cn: 调查涉及1,000万英镑的汽车保险诈骗案的警察昨天逮捕了16人。

sentence.Network_en: They arrested the men and frog-marched them to the local police station.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们逮捕了这些人，并把他们押送到当地警察局。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 须眉被捕(Arrested)者中断定一名巡捕新闻稿行动尼古拉詹金斯（ 38 ）一名状师，连同(Together with the)彼得亚伯拉罕（ 25 ） Betch…
你被逮捕（arrested）过吗？你车上拉的货物是什么？
was arrested for disturbing the peace ., 因扰乱治安而被捕.
...手机向Twitter发送了这条消息，只有一个单词“被捕了”(Arrested)。

list.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... arrange 安排 arrest 逮捕，阻止 arrive 到达.
2013年高考英语词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... arrangement n. 安排，布置 arrest v. 逮捕，拘留 arrival n. 到来，到达.
英语_火力发电厂英语单词大全[1] - 豆丁网 ... armature 电枢，转子衔铁 Arrester 避雷器 Ash 灰烬，废墟.
纸业专业英语词汇翻译(A3) ... aromatic group 芳烃基 arrester 制动片，制动机构 arresting device 制动机构.

entry.def: If the police arrest you, they take charge of you and take you to a police station, because they believe you may have committed a crime.

example.ex: Police arrested five young men in connection with one of the attacks...
example.tran: 警方逮捕了与其中一次袭击有关的5名青年男子。

example.ex: The police say seven people were arrested for minor offences.
example.tran: 警方称有7人因轻罪被捕。

entry.def: If something or someone arrests a process, they stop it continuing.

example.ex: The sufferer may have to make major changes in his or her life to arrest the disease...
example.tran: 患者可能必须对生活习惯作出重大调整以控制病情。

example.ex: The law could arrest the development of good research if applied prematurely.
example.tran: 如果草率施行，该法律将会阻滞高质量研究的进展。

entry.def: If something interesting or surprising arrests your attention, you suddenly notice it and then continue to look at it or consider it carefully.

example.ex: The work of an architect of genius always arrests the attention no matter how little remains...
example.tran: 天才建筑师的作品无论残留多少都能最大限度地吸引眼球。

example.ex: As he reached the hall after her, he saw what had arrested her.
example.tran: 他跟随她到了大厅，看见了吸引她注意的东西。

auth_sentence.content: He is among the few to have been arrested.
auth_sentence.res_content: He is among the few to have been arrested.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He is among the few to have been arrested.

auth_sentence.content: Ira was arrested for being drunk and disorderly repeatedly.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ira was arrested for being drunk and disorderly repeatedly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ira was arrested for being drunk and disorderly repeatedly.

auth_sentence.content: You must show cause why you violently arrested me.
auth_sentence.res_content: You must show cause why you violently arrested me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You must show cause why you violently arrested me.
